code: import axios from'axios';var API=axios.create({baseURL:'https://charms.herokuapp.com/'});export var fetchPosts=function fetchPosts(){return API.get(baseURL);};export var createPost=function createPost(newPost){return API.post(baseURL,newPost);};export var updatePost=function updatePost(id,updatedPost){return API.patch("".concat(baseURL,"/").concat(id),updatedPost);};export var deletePost=function deletePost(id){return API.delete("".concat(baseURL,"/").concat(id));};export var likePost=function likePost(id){return API.patch("".concat(baseURL,"/").concat(id,"/likePost"));};
